post:
Hello Let people ,

today we have made some numbers and this will be a limited offer in a "sister" price :

Storage kvm 1tb

1 core
512 mb ram
1 tb Hdd (Raid 6 or raid60 depend of the node)
5 tb traffic/mo
1 ipv4
1gbps port speed (shared, if you make traffic all day all night stay under 150mbps)
Located in Romania

Price .... here come the sisters, start from  : 1.388888 eur/month (if you pay for 3 years in advance)


**What you need to know about this offer :

1)this offer is limited one to 1000 kvm and we guarantee this price will not came any more in the next years in Hostsolutions.ro 
2) our network was high improved and we still add some new peering in the next 2-3 month
3) all vps is ddos protected
4) we are not the best in the tiketing support but we work to improove this .
5) WE DO NOT OFFER MONEY BACK GUARANTEE IN THIS OFFER EXCEPT SPECIAL CASE (i meen if is our culpability we can discuss)
6) Affiliates please note : we will PAY ONLY 1EUR/CLIENT for this order because is verry verry cheap so if you want to give something back to your visitators you can publish

7) The first 250 orders will be provided instantly (5 min) and the rest (in order what we have received) we will provide in the next 2 weeks.**


8) this offer do not have due date , we will continue to sell until the stock is gone.

9) Any question related to this offer please post here

10) For the moment only the template what we have in list but we plan to add something more including windows .

11) think before buy , if you dont need it do not buy , if you place the order and you dont pay  in the next 4-6 hours the order will be automatically canceled (we do not reserve).

12) The price is not recurring !!! One time payment , after the contractual period we will see ...

13) when we do such offers we ask for patciense , no tikets asking when will be activated , no tikets about change ip , no tikets asking whatever. Please use the tiketing support in the next 48 hours only for downtimes or payments .

14) Thanks all to be part of this , we can do this price due of YOU , yes you who was beleve in Hostsolutions.ro


Where to buy ? click here : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=415
